secret_rule: Only items that are palindromes can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "racecar" and "kayak".
I would like to make a new guess. Can I bring "level"?

Based on the provided examples ("racecar", "kayak", "level", and "civic") and their acceptance by the game master, the secret rule appears to be that the words must be palindromes. A palindrome is a word that reads the same backward as forward. Thus, my best guess for the rule is: "The words must be palindromes."
Correct! The rule is: Only items that are palindromes can be brought to the picnic.
